name: DEMI demo
description:
Movement Shooter inspired by recent DOOM

Controls:

Space Bar - Dash (Interact)

Shift - Throw

LMB - Fire, Melee, Deflect

RMB - Fire, Melee, Deflect

ESC, P - Pause game

Scrollwheel, Number Keys - Switch Weapons

Youtube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQBoOYw9_V1eofV6HbbBWCw/
